short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See how much it rained in the last 24 hours

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Precip is the best app for checking rainfall totals. With this extension, you can automatically lookup recent rainfall totals at your current device location. 

With the Precip mobile app you can:
- Look up recent rainfall anywhere in the United States
- View daily rainfall totals on a calendar
- See how many days since it last rained
- Calculate year to date total rainfall
- Compare this year's rain to 30-year normals

Visit https://precip.ai/download to get the app. 

Unlike other weather apps, Precip shows you highly accurate daily rainfall totals at precise locations. We use high resolution radar, gauge, and climatology data processed through advanced models to remotely sense precipitation without needing to install any physical instrumentation. Our data from the national weather service is continuously refined and updated to be the most accurate and useful source for monitoring rainfall, snow, and other types of precipitation.

Learn more at: https://precip.ai
